snippet: With the closing of Hostess Brands, Dan Barry, the This Land columnist for The New York Times, looks back on a time when we would have chosen Ring Dings from the 7-Eleven over a warm pastry from a baker’s oven. “Not even close.” Read more »

lead_paragraph: With the closing of Hostess Brands, Dan Barry, the This Land columnist for The New York Times, looks back on a time when we would have chosen Ring Dings from the 7-Eleven over a warm pastry from a baker’s oven. “Not even close.” Read more »

headline.main: Back When a Chocolate Puck Tasted, Guiltily, Like America
